DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Survey Evaluating Effectiveness Safety Dual Inhibition Lipid-lowering Treatment Dyslipidemia ( Study P05171 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Patient > 20 year < 75 year age index date* Patient diagnose dyslipidemia respond adequately base NCEP ATP III target previous lipid lower treatment , receive dual inhibition therapy , ezetimibe plus statin , ezetimibe plus fenofibrate ezetimibe alone , least 3 month Patient least one Total Cholesterol LDLC measurement baseline 3 month initiate dual inhibition therapy .
